description:

| **Pattern ID** | `XSS_REFL_007` |
| **Name** | Select onfocus XSS |
| **Category** | XSS |
| **Subcategory** | reflected_xss |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `<select onfocus=alert('XSS') autofocus>`
